languages.text: This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: [draft] This creature can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} amount, without spending momentum and setting the heroic act on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

languages.text: Этот персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при любом значении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. При этом расхода моментума не происходит.
languages.original_text: This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

languages.text: Dieser Charakter kann seine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} ungeachtet seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} einsetzen, ohne Dynamik zu verbrauchen.
languages.original_text: This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Charakter kann seine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} ungeachtet seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} einsetzen, ohne Dynamik zu verbrauchen.

languages.text: Ce personnage peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} quelle que soit sa {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}, sans dépenser de fougue.
languages.original_text: This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Ce personnage peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} quelle que soit sa {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}, sans dépenser de fougue.

languages.text: 此角色可以无视{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}要求使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，且英雄壮举不消耗士气值。
languages.original_text: This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: 此角色可以无视{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}要求使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，且英雄壮举不消耗士气值。

languages.text: Este personaje puede usar su {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} independientemente de su {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y sin consumirlo.
languages.original_text: This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Este personaje puede usar su {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} independientemente de su {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y sin consumirlo.

languages.text: このキャラクターは、自身の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}に関係なく、推進力を消費せずに{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を実行できる。
languages.original_text: This character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは、自身の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}に関係なく、推進力を消費せずに{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を実行できる。

languages.text: Bu karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumuna{/g} bakmaksızın hiç momentum harcamadan {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemini{/g} kullanabilir.
